announcement.content:
v1.7.3 Bugfix Update:

  • ğŸ› Dice So Nice Wait Fix: Cut-ins no longer hang when the message has roll data but no actual dice (e.g., Daggerheart flat values). Now only waits for real dice rolls.
  • ğŸ› Timeout Safety Net: 8-second fallback ensures cut-ins play even if Dice So Nice doesn't respond.
